archimate:DataObject.name: ResourceRoleDetails
archimate:DataObject.documentation: This class implements the semantics of the ResourceTakesOnRoles aggregation. It also serves as the parent class for defining the classes that implement the RolesDescribePhysicalResource; RolesDescribeLogicalResource; and RolesDescribeCompoundResource aggregations. These three classes are named RolesDescribePhysicalResourceDetails; RolesDescribeLogicalResourceDetails; and RolesDescribeCompoundResourceDetailsm respectively.
